img.div: We believe our difference challenge our points of view and lead to better outcomes

div.style: z-index: 8; white-space: nowrap; font-size: 90px; line-height: 40px; letter-spacing: px;

h3.span: Our buildings are closed, but learning continues.

h4.a: Student Supplies and Material Request Form

p.span: Our District is located in the city of Wyoming, Michigan, the largest suburb of metropolitan Grand Rapids and the 18th largest city in Michigan. It is a city of well-kept neighborhoods and parks. Recreational and cultural opportunities abound, and the community atmosphere emphasizes family values.

The Wyoming Public School District has a staff of approximately 475 employees, including teachers, administrators, secretaries, paraeducators, food service, maintenance and custodial staff, bus drivers, mechanics, and community education personnel. Our student enrollment is approximately 4,500 students.

div.p: Wyoming Public Schools will be the first choice for education and the pride of our community.
Wyoming Public Schools will empower all students to discover and achieve their potential in an inclusive, inspiring, and innovative culture of learning.

img.alt: Image of WAY MI School Data Logo

p.span: Over 20,000 meals served to students by WPS food service team members and volunteers this week! Grab and go meals available each Monday, Wednesday and Friday from 12-1 PM at West Elementary and Wyoming Junior High! 🍎🥪🥕🥦 #BetterTogetherWPS #DoingMIPart #SchoolsGetItDone

”I trust this experience will make each of my theater members much stronger and even more dedicated than before when we are finally back together again” said Jeremy Schnotala, Wyoming Theater Company Director. #BetterTogetherWPS #WyomingWolves
Check out the tips and supports linked to our WPS Continuity of Learning Plan which begins today and continues through the end of the 2019-20 school year. 💜🐺#BetterTogetherWPS #DoingMIPart
WIS Teachers and their Sunday best! #BetterTogetherWPS
62,676 meals have been served to students by WPS food service team members and volunteers since March 16th! Thank you! 🍎🥪🥕🥦 #BetterTogetherWPS #DoingMIPart #SchoolsGetItDone
